title: Readout of President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. Call with President Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden spoke today with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, conveying his interest in a constructive bilateral relationship with expanded areas of cooperation and effective management of disagreements. The leaders agreed to hold a bilateral meeting on the margins of the NATO Summit in June to discuss the full range of bilateral and regional issues.###
